@bharadwaj003 : I ended up installing minconda and then using the instructions at http://pytorch.org/ to install with conda instead of pip.

For my system, then:

wget https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh
./Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh
# Follow prompts
. $HOME/.bashrc
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda75 -c pytorch

body:
@bharadwaj003 : I ended up installing minconda and then using the instructions at [http://pytorch.org/](http://pytorch.org/) to install with conda instead of pip.

For my system, then:

```
wget https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh
./Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh
# Follow prompts
. $HOME/.bashrc
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda75 -c pytorch
```
